languages.text: "{name}, при всем моем уважении... вы уверены в правильности такого поступка? Нам ничего не известно о том, что это за ксенос и зачем она втерлась в доверие к губернатору. Насколько я вижу, она не слишком стремится нам помочь — и все же, по какой-то явно темной причине, согласилась участвовать в расследовании..."

traits.locale_text: "Ты явно вынюхала на Янусе куда меньше, чем нужно для суждений об имперской иерархии, тварь".

languages.text: "{name}, with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."
languages.original_text: "{name}, при всем моем уважении... вы уверены в правильности такого поступка? Нам ничего не известно о том, что это за ксенос и зачем она втерлась в доверие к губернатору. Насколько я вижу, она не слишком стремится нам помочь — и все же, по какой-то явно темной причине, согласилась участвовать в расследовании..."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."

"{name}, with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."

"{name}, with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."

"{name}, with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."

languages.text: “{name}，恕我直言……你确定这真的是正确的选择吗？我们对这个异形一无所知，也不明白她是由于什么原因才得到了总督的信任。在我看来，她并非很热衷于帮助我们，但出于某种非常明显的可疑动机，她决定加入我们的调查……”
languages.original_text: "{name}, with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，恕我直言……你确定这真的是正确的选择吗？我们对这个异形一无所知，也不明白她是由于什么原因才得到了总督的信任。在我看来，她并非很热衷于帮助我们，但出于某种非常明显的可疑动机，她决定加入我们的调查……”

languages.text: «{name}, con el debido respeto... ¿está segur{mf|o|a} de que esta es la decisión correcta? No sabemos nada de esta xenos ni de por qué se ha infiltrado en el círculo de confianza de la gobernadora. Por lo que veo, no está particularmente interesada en ayudarnos, pero por algún motivo claramente siniestro ha decidido participar en nuestra investigación...».
languages.original_text: "{name}, with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."

traits.locale_text: «{name}, con el debido respeto... ¿está segur{mf|o|a} de que esta es la decisión correcta? No sabemos nada de esta xenos ni de por qué se ha infiltrado en el círculo de confianza de la gobernadora. Por lo que veo, no está particularmente interesada en ayudarnos, pero por algún motivo claramente siniestro ha decidido participar en nuestra investigación...».

languages.text: 「{name}さん、失礼ながら…これが正しい判断と本当にお考えですか？この異種族そのものも、総督の信頼を得てふところに潜り込んだ理由も、何も分からない。奴は我々を助ける気が特にあるようには思えない、ということは言える。何らかの黒い腹積りがあって、我々の調査に参加を決めたのは明白…」
languages.original_text: "{name}, with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}さん、失礼ながら…これが正しい判断と本当にお考えですか？この異種族そのものも、総督の信頼を得てふところに潜り込んだ理由も、何も分からない。奴は我々を助ける気が特にあるようには思えない、ということは言える。何らかの黒い腹積りがあって、我々の調査に参加を決めたのは明白…」

languages.text: "{name}, bei allem Respekt ... haltet Ihr das wirklich für die richtige Entscheidung? Wir wissen nichts über diese Xenos oder den Grund, warum sie sich das Vertrauen der Gouverneurin erschlichen hat. Soweit ich sehe, ist sie nicht besonders erpicht darauf, uns zu helfen – und dennoch hat sie aus irgendeinem offensichtlich nebulösen Grund beschlossen, an unserer Ermittlung teilzunehmen ..."
languages.original_text: "{name}, with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, bei allem Respekt ... haltet Ihr das wirklich für die richtige Entscheidung? Wir wissen nichts über diese Xenos oder den Grund, warum sie sich das Vertrauen der Gouverneurin erschlichen hat. Soweit ich sehe, ist sie nicht besonders erpicht darauf, uns zu helfen – und dennoch hat sie aus irgendeinem offensichtlich nebulösen Grund beschlossen, an unserer Ermittlung teilzunehmen ..."

languages.text: « {name}, avec tout le respect que je vous dois... pensez-vous vraiment que ce soit une sage décision ? Nous ne savons rien de cette xénos, pas même comment elle s'est retrouvée dans l'entourage de la gouverneure. Et si elle ne semble pas tenir particulièrement à nous aider, elle a manifestement décidé de prendre part à notre enquête pour une raison qui nous échappe... »
languages.original_text: "{name}, with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, avec tout le respect que je vous dois... pensez-vous vraiment que ce soit une sage décision ? Nous ne savons rien de cette xénos, pas même comment elle s'est retrouvée dans l'entourage de la gouverneure. Et si elle ne semble pas tenir particulièrement à nous aider, elle a manifestement décidé de prendre part à notre enquête pour une raison qui nous échappe... »

languages.original_text: ", with all due respect... are you sure this is the right decision? We know nothing about this xenos or why she has wormed her way into the governor's confidence. As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."

languages.text: "{name}, saygısızlık etmek istemem ama bunun doğru bir hareket olduğuna emin misin? Ne bu zeno hakkında ne de valinin güvenini kazanmak için ne oyunlar çevirdiği konusunda bir şey biliyoruz. Anladığım kadarıyla bize yardımcı olmaya o kadar da istekli değil ve buna rağmen karanlık olduğu belli olan bazı amaçlar uğruna soruşturmamızda yer almaya karar veriyor."

As far as I can tell, she isn't especially keen to help us — and yet for some obviously dark reason she has decided to take part in our investigation..."
